424 +      name: "missing run target name",

426           WorkspacePath: "/tmp/workspaces",

458         }

462 -        if agent.Name == "" && !tt.wantErr {
463 -          t.Error("expected no error for missing agent name")
460 +      // Check run targets
461 +      for _, target := range cfg.RunTargets {
462 +        if target.Name == "" && !tt.wantErr {
